title: Nikolai Blignaut
text: Hendrik Nikolai Blignaut (born 1 October 1985 in <a href="East%20London%2C%20Eastern%20Cape">East London</a>, <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for club side College Rovers. He previously played provincial rugby for the and and usually plays as a <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a> or <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">flanker</a>.
